author: rekovic
body:
Bring l1t-integration v99.0 to CMSSW_10_2_X.

Contains:
* Updates to Kalman BMTF emulator (fixes low pt)
* Removal of annoying print statements from BMTF unpacker
* Updates to OMTF emulator for GhostBuster and fw 5
* Calo expert tools
* Trigger Prefire Veto filter
* HI EG condition for 2018

This PR files of this PR and python config files.
* 4 of them concern central workflows [1]
* 40 of them are expert level (L1Ntuples, and are not used in any central workflows [1]

[1]
EventFilter/L1TRawToDigi/python/l1tRawtoDigiBMTF_cfi.py
L1Trigger/L1TMuonBarrel/python/simKBmtfDigis_cfi.py
L1Trigger/L1TMuonBarrel/python/simKBmtfStubs_cfi.py
L1Trigger/L1TMuonOverlap/python/fakeOmtfParams_cff.py


[2]

title: PR 10_3_X L1T integration v99.0
